info.title: Ethereum JSON-RPC Specification
info.description: A specification of the standard interface for Ethereum clients.

post.summary: Returns information about a block by hash.

example.method: Returns information about a block by hash.

post.summary: Returns information about a block by number.

example.method: Returns information about a block by number.

post.summary: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash.

example.method: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash.

post.summary: Returns the number of transactions in a block matching the given block number.

example.method: Returns the number of transactions in a block matching the given block number.

post.summary: Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block hash.

example.method: Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block hash.

post.summary: Returns the number of transactions in a block matching the given block number.

example.method: Returns the number of transactions in a block matching the given block number.

post.summary: Returns the chain ID of the current network.

example.method: Returns the chain ID of the current network.

post.summary: Returns an object with data about the sync status or false.

example.method: Returns an object with data about the sync status or false.

post.summary: Returns the client coinbase address.

example.method: Returns the client coinbase address.

post.summary: Returns a list of addresses owned by client.

example.method: Returns a list of addresses owned by client.

post.summary: Returns the number of most recent block.

example.method: Returns the number of most recent block.

post.summary: Executes a new message call immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain.

example.method: Executes a new message call immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain.

post.summary: Generates and returns an estimate of how much gas is necessary to allow the transaction to complete.

example.method: Generates and returns an estimate of how much gas is necessary to allow the transaction to complete.

post.summary: Generates an access list for a transaction.

example.method: Generates an access list for a transaction.

post.summary: Returns the current price per gas in wei.

example.method: Returns the current price per gas in wei.

post.summary: Returns the current maxPriorityFeePerGas per gas in wei.

example.method: Returns the current maxPriorityFeePerGas per gas in wei.

post.summary: Transaction fee history

example.method: Transaction fee history

post.summary: Creates a filter object, based on filter options, to notify when the state changes (logs).

example.method: Creates a filter object, based on filter options, to notify when the state changes (logs).

post.summary: Creates a filter in the node, to notify when a new block arrives.

example.method: Creates a filter in the node, to notify when a new block arrives.

post.summary: Creates a filter in the node, to notify when new pending transactions arrive.

example.method: Creates a filter in the node, to notify when new pending transactions arrive.

post.summary: Uninstalls a filter with given id.

example.method: Uninstalls a filter with given id.

post.summary: Polling method for a filter, which returns an array of logs which occurred since last poll.

example.method: Polling method for a filter, which returns an array of logs which occurred since last poll.

post.summary: Returns an array of all logs matching filter with given id.

example.method: Returns an array of all logs matching filter with given id.

post.summary: Returns an array of all logs matching filter with given id.

example.method: Returns an array of all logs matching filter with given id.

post.summary: Returns whether the client is actively mining new blocks.

example.method: Returns whether the client is actively mining new blocks.

post.summary: Returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with.

example.method: Returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with.

post.summary: Returns the hash of the current block, the seedHash, and the boundary condition to be met (“target”).

example.method: Returns the hash of the current block, the seedHash, and the boundary condition to be met (“target”).

post.summary: Used for submitting a proof-of-work solution.

example.method: Used for submitting a proof-of-work solution.

post.summary: Used for submitting mining hashrate.

example.method: Used for submitting mining hashrate.

post.summary: Returns an EIP-191 signature over the provided data.

example.method: Returns an EIP-191 signature over the provided data.

post.summary: Returns an RLP encoded transaction signed by the specified account.

example.method: Returns an RLP encoded transaction signed by the specified account.

post.summary: Returns the balance of the account of given address.

example.method: Returns the balance of the account of given address.

post.summary: Returns the value from a storage position at a given address.

example.method: Returns the value from a storage position at a given address.

post.summary: Returns the number of transactions sent from an address.

example.method: Returns the number of transactions sent from an address.

post.summary: Returns code at a given address.

example.method: Returns code at a given address.

post.summary: Returns the merkle proof for a given account and optionally some storage keys.

example.method: Returns the merkle proof for a given account and optionally some storage keys.

post.summary: Signs and submits a transaction.

example.method: Signs and submits a transaction.

post.summary: Submits a raw transaction.

example.method: Submits a raw transaction.

post.summary: Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.

example.method: Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.

post.summary: Returns information about a transaction by block hash and transaction index position.

example.method: Returns information about a transaction by block hash and transaction index position.

post.summary: Returns information about a transaction by block number and transaction index position.

example.method: Returns information about a transaction by block number and transaction index position.

post.summary: Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash.

example.method: Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash.
